title: Групповой пуск крылатых ракет 'Калибр'' подлодкой 'Ростов-на-Дону' по объектам террористов в Сирии
description: Massive launch of the Kalibr sea-based missiles was effectuated by the Rostov-on-Don submarine. It resulted in elimination of two important ISIS command centres in the Raqqah province.

checklog.log_entry: changed the status to verified

changed the status to In Progress

impact at these two sites here https://twitter.com/obretix/status/674353190654115841

changed the status to verified

And 1:15-1:18 is also from the first strike site. So two sites in this video, both geolocated. Locations are in Raqqa governorate as indicated by the video.
1:18-1:23 is from the site of the first strike.
Second strike between 1:04-1:15 is in Al-Thawrah. Impact approx at 35.84126, 38.54340. Wide view: http://i.imgur.com/X64ylF0.jpg Closeup: http://i.imgur.com/gHyLs2W.jpg
First strike area looks right from comparison of the roads, river & buildings. Impact is around 35.79028, 38.54096. (not exact) Comparison from close-up. http://i.imgur.com/TptAamu.jpg
The first strike depicted at 0:54 seems to be here:http://wikimapia.org/#lang=en&lat=35.791361&lon=38.545017&z=13
changed the status to In Progress
added this report
